about_the_game:
This is an extensive collection of materials that will come in handy for creating horror games in both "RPG Maker MZ" and "RPG Maker MV."

The collection features a wide range of materials that have been transformed into abandoned ruins, from outdoor buildings to indoor items. You will find both pre-ruined and post-ruined building materials, as well as a range of colorful variations for each. With a whopping 20 items to choose from, the possibilities are endless!


◆ Material contents ◆
◇Outdoors
Building ruins before/after: 20 items (each with 2-4 color variations)
Floor tiles: 4 items

◇Indoors
Floor tiles: 10 items
Wall tiles: 5 items
Items: 91 items (2-4 varieties in each direction)

◇Characters
Face: 1 male/1 female
Walking: 1 male/1 female

◇Others
System: conversation text box, an arrow

※ All tile items are 1 tile 48x48 size.

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
